description: Part of a collection between the fashion house and Jordan Brand, the Dior x Air Jordan 1 High released in April 2020. The shoe's Italian leather upper appears in a mix of white and grey, with a Dior Oblique jacquard Swoosh contrasting the side wall. The tongue tag and 'Wings' logo sport co-branding, with further branding revealed by the icy translucent outsole.
name: Jordan 1s - Ice Blue
reviews: I really like them - I enjoy being able to afford nice things. - Luc M
